Texts.Chs: 其内描写了制作一把威力残虐的法杖的一些事宜。
Texts.Eng: Instructions on constructing a fell staff

Never be without your implements, young apprentice. The staff is your most favored good, and without it you are but meat to the Elder ones. You must fashion it from an Elder Tome, 2 Valtan Casing and an Elder Bust...
